# html2pdf
Convert HTML page to PDF document

## Usage: 

```
html2pdf [options]

Convert HTML page to PDF document

Options:
  -V, --version                          output the version number
  --url <url>                            url to load, for local files use: file:///path/to/file
  --pdf <pdf>                            output for generated file can be relative to current directory
  --format <format>                      Paper format, Default is A4. (default: "A4")
  --print-background <print_background>  Print background graphics. Defaults to true (default: true)
  --scale <scale>                        Scale of the webpage rendering. Defaults to 1 (default: 1)
  --margin-top                           Margin top. Defaults to 3mm
  --margin-bottom                        Margin bottom. Defaults to 3mm
  --margin-left                          Margin left. Defaults to 3mm
  --margin-right                         Margin right. Defaults to 3mm
  -h, --help                             output usage information
  
 ```
